text: Wilma Chan (; October 5, 1949 â€“ November 3, 2021) was an American Democratic Party politician. Chan was born in Boston, Massachusetts. She was a member of the Alameda County Board of Supervisors between 1995 until 2000 and again from 2011 until her death. Chan was also a member of the California State Assembly between 2000 and 2006. Chan was hit by a car while she was walking her dog on November 3, 2021 in Alameda, California. She died from her injuries at a hospital a few hours later, aged 72. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Road accident deaths in California Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Oakland, California Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Wilma Chan
